WRITING.TEXT: According to the sources of the resource, Galaxy S6 Active will be largely similar to the basic model of the device, at least in matters that concerns characteristics. In their version, the smartphone should get the same 5.1-inch screen QHD Super AMOLED +, Exynos 7420 processor, 3 GB RAM, 32 GB of internal storage, as well as 16-megapixel main and a 5-megapixel front camera.
